dmca.title: Adcracker Cracks Open DMCA Notice
dmca.body:
Request for removal of infringed content from Google's search results.

The following information is presented for the purposes of removing web content that infringes on my copyrights per the Digital Millenium Copyright Act.

We have contacted the infringer several times and he has not responded to our requests to remove the infringed content.

1. Identification of Copyrighted Work:

The copyrighted material is located at this URL: 
http://www.adcracker.com/brief/index.htm

An excerpt of the copyrighted material is as follows:

"A creative brief is like a road map. A good brief leads to imaginative and persuasive ads. And gets you there quickly. A bad brief starts you off in the wrong direction. So you have to stop, figure out where the heck you're going, and start again. Or worse, you follow that brief to Trash Town, a total waste of time. "

The copyrighted work at issue is an article entitled, "How to write a creative brief," including samples. The article is registered with the US Copyright Office in my name (Steve McNamara) under the copyright number TX 6-425-811. The infringed material is posted on my Website:

2. Identification of infringed material:

The full text of the infringed material is located at this URL:
http://www.there-fore.com/pages/brief.html

An excerpt of the infringed material is as follows:

"A creative brief is like a road map. A good brief leads to imaginative and persuasive ads. And gets you there quickly. A bad brief starts you off in the wrong direction. So you have to stop, figure out where the heck you're going, and start again. Or worse, you follow that brief to Trash Town, a total waste of time."

It also appears that the infringer is offering for free the copyrighted creative briefs that I sell on my website, AdCracker.com

The infringed material appears in the following Google search:

Search query: google
Infringing web pages: www.there-fore.com/pages/brief.html

therefore creative translation and interpretation services
A creative brief is like a road map. A good brief leads to imaginative and persuasive ads. And gets you there quickly. ...
www.there-fore.com/pages/brief.html - 7k - Cached - Similar pages - Note this

3. Copyright owner contact information

[Private]
[private]
San Clemente, CA, 92672
[Private]@adcracker.com
[Private]

4. Copyright infringer contact information

[Private]
Therefore Creative
[Private]
Windsor Gardens
Newcastle, Tyne & Wear NE55BH
United Kingdom
Phone: [Private]
Email: [Private]@there-fore.com

5. Copyright owner's sworn statement:

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above have been infringed in violation of my rights under US and international copyright law as well as the DMCA.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of the material described above.

[Private]
Eugene, Oregon
Date: <April 25, 2007>
